author: smorovic
body: #### PR description: Per-tbb-thread microstate sampling, more accurate with module-level multithreading (unscheduled execution). Also changes acquire sampling. Unused functionality (ministates, slow json file etc.) removed. Includes also TBB concurrency tracking which is based on flagging which thread is running and which isn't scheduled. In that case Idle state is reflagged as Fwk (except if input source is waiting for input). This will cover time spend outside modules by threads from the pool. #### PR validation: Unit tests pass. Tested in DAQ3VAL system. Microstate screenshot:
title: DAQ - add per-tbb-thread microstate (14_0_X)
